name: Simpson Manufacturing Co., Inc.
description: Simpson Manufacturing Co., Inc. is a leading manufacturer of wood and concrete construction products, primarily known for its innovative fastening solutions. Founded in 1956 and headquartered in Pleasanton, California, Simpson's mission is to provide high-quality products that improve structural integrity and ensure safety in construction. The company offers a wide range of products, including connectors, fasteners, adhesives, and tools, which cater to residential, commercial, and industrial construction markets. With a strong emphasis on research and development, Simpson continually seeks to enhance its product offerings, focusing on sustainability and eco-friendliness in its manufacturing processes. The company's commitment to quality is reflected in its rigorous testing standards and extensive product warranties, making it a trusted choice among builders and contractors. Simpson operates several manufacturing facilities across the United States and internationally, ensuring a robust supply chain and efficient distribution of its products. The company is also dedicated to providing exceptional customer service and technical support, reinforcing its position as a leader in the construction industry.
